title: TrueDocs: Hackathon Presentation
description: A presentation showcasing TrueDocs, our AI-powered solution that addresses documentation gaps in both business and technical domains through automated, versioned documentation updates as part of the Definition of Done.
audience: Judging panel for the Kainos AI Hackathon including developers, architects, QAs, and stakeholders
style: Professional and engaging, with clear problem-solution structure and visual demonstrations

slides.description: Introduction to TrueDocs - overview of the hackathon project and team

details.Project Goal: To create an AI-powered solution that automates documentation updates for both business and technical domains

slides.description: TrueDocs Business: Business Documentation Tracking - understanding implemented functionality is slow and costly
slides.details: As projects scale, business context becomes fragmented across tools like Jira and Confluence, creating gaps between requirements and delivered behavior

slides.description: TrueDocs Tech: Technical Documentation Tracking - knowledge scattered across code and outdated docs
slides.details: New joiners struggle with onboarding, increasing reliance on seniors and slowing development in large projects

slides.description: Our Solution: AI-powered documentation updates for both domains
slides.details: Add an AI-powered step to the Definition of Done that updates both business and technical documentation for each completed story. For business docs, AI uses Jira and Confluence to draft business rules summaries. For technical docs, AI uses code changes and Jira to draft technical decisions and dependencies. The owner of the ticket reviews and commits the updates to source control for versioning and traceability.

slides.description: Value Proposition - benefits for the company, the team, and clients
slides.details: Single source of truth for business rules and technical knowledge, faster decision-making, reduced senior dependency, smoother onboarding, better AI assistance, early discrepancy detection, higher engineering quality, and improved client satisfaction.

slides.description: Demo - showing how TrueDocs works in practice
slides.details: Demo of the AI documentation generation process and integration with development workflow

slides.description: What We Accomplished - key activities during the hackathon

activities: setup a new repo for hackaton
generated a sample TODO management app to use as base for testing the documentation update process
created basic tech and business documentation in the /docs folder in the repo that describes functionality of the TODO app
added mkdocs tool for deploying the documentation from markdown so it can be exposed to business people
setup jira for the project and generated sample jira tickets for the TODO app
created prompt for generating a commit with docs update with developer involvement
create a prompt for querying the documentation to get information about how system works or how sth is implemented

slides.description: Impact and Next Steps - summary of benefits and future development plans
slides.details: What comes next for the project
immediate-plans: Run pilot in Digital NHS Health Checks project
Refine AI prompts and integration based on real-world use
Gather feedback from users and stakeholders
future_plans: Verify ability to perform discrepancy checks between code and business requirements
Use the documentation to plan for onboarding new joiners
Expand to other company projects - potentially make the tool available via Instructo developed by another Hackathon team
